description: These pickled cherries are a tangy and sweet addition to any dessert.
keywords: Sweet toppings,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Cherry,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tangy & Sweet Pickled Cherries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Boil a suitable and sealable glass container to sterilise and then allow to cool. In a pot, all ingredients and bring to the boil.
Lower the heat and then allow to simmer until the sugar has melted completely and the liquid reduces slightly.
Now remove from the heat and allow to cool slightly. Empty contents into your storage jar and keep in the fridge.
